AI Agent Framework
  • Policies API Reference
  • View page source

Policies API Reference

This section documents the policy classes that control agent behavior.

Policy Presets

Policy Presets for Framework v2.

Presets provide common policy configurations for quick adoption.

agent_framework.policies.presets.get_preset(preset_name: str) → dict[source]

Get a preset policy configuration.

agent_framework.policies.presets.list_presets() → list[str][source]

List available preset names.

Default Policies

DefaultCompletionDetector

class agent_framework.policies.default.DefaultCompletionDetector(indicators: List[str] | None = None, check_final_response: bool = True, check_operation_types: List[str] | None = None, check_response_validation: bool = True, check_history_depth: int = 10)[source]

Bases: CompletionDetector

Default completion detection using configurable patterns.

__init__(indicators: List[str] | None = None, check_final_response: bool = True, check_operation_types: List[str] | None = None, check_response_validation: bool = True, check_history_depth: int = 10)[source]
is_complete(result: Any, history: List[Dict[str, Any]], context: Dict[str, Any]) → bool[source]

Check if result indicates completion.

IMPORTANT: Only checks the CURRENT turns history to avoid false positives from previous turn completions. A new turn starts with a task entry.

DefaultTerminationPolicy

class agent_framework.policies.default.DefaultTerminationPolicy(max_iterations: int | None = None, require_terminal_tool: bool = False, terminal_tools: List[str] | None = None, check_completion: bool = True, completion_detector: CompletionDetector | None = None, on_max_iterations: str = 'error')[source]

Bases: TerminationPolicy

Configurable termination policy.

__init__(max_iterations: int | None = None, require_terminal_tool: bool = False, terminal_tools: List[str] | None = None, check_completion: bool = True, completion_detector: CompletionDetector | None = None, on_max_iterations: str = 'error')[source]
should_terminate(iteration: int, plan_outcome: Any, history: List[Dict[str, Any]], context: Dict[str, Any]) → bool[source]

Check if execution should terminate.

DefaultLoopPreventionPolicy

class agent_framework.policies.default.DefaultLoopPreventionPolicy(enabled: bool = True, action_window: int = 5, observation_window: int = 5, repetition_threshold: int = 3, check_completion_in_loop: bool = True, completion_detector: CompletionDetector | None = None, on_stagnation: str = 'error')[source]

Bases: LoopPreventionPolicy

Configurable loop prevention.

__init__(enabled: bool = True, action_window: int = 5, observation_window: int = 5, repetition_threshold: int = 3, check_completion_in_loop: bool = True, completion_detector: CompletionDetector | None = None, on_stagnation: str = 'error')[source]
detect_stagnation(action_history: List[Tuple], observation_history: List[Any], context: Dict[str, Any]) → str | None[source]

Detect stagnation in execution.

DefaultHITLPolicy

class agent_framework.policies.default.DefaultHITLPolicy(enabled: bool = False, scope: str = 'writes', write_tools: List[str] | None = None)[source]

Bases: HITLPolicy

Configurable HITL policy.

__init__(enabled: bool = False, scope: str = 'writes', write_tools: List[str] | None = None)[source]
requires_approval(tool_name: str, tool_args: Dict[str, Any], context: Dict[str, Any]) → bool[source]

Check if approval is required.

create_approval_request(tool_name: str, tool_args: Dict[str, Any], context: Dict[str, Any]) → Dict[str, Any][source]

Create approval request payload.

DefaultCheckpointPolicy

class agent_framework.policies.default.DefaultCheckpointPolicy(enabled: bool = False, checkpoint_after_iterations: int | None = None, checkpoint_on_operations: List[str] | None = None, checkpoint_on_tools: List[str] | None = None)[source]

Bases: CheckpointPolicy

Configurable checkpoint policy for intermediate results.

__init__(enabled: bool = False, checkpoint_after_iterations: int | None = None, checkpoint_on_operations: List[str] | None = None, checkpoint_on_tools: List[str] | None = None)[source]
should_checkpoint(result: Any, iteration: int, context: Dict[str, Any]) → bool[source]

Check if checkpoint should occur.

create_checkpoint_response(result: Any, context: Dict[str, Any]) → FinalResponse[source]

Create checkpoint response.

DefaultFollowUpPolicy

class agent_framework.policies.default.DefaultFollowUpPolicy(enabled: bool = True, max_phases: int | None = None, check_completion: bool = True, completion_detector: CompletionDetector | None = None, stop_on_completion: bool = True)[source]

Bases: FollowUpPolicy

Configurable follow-up policy.

__init__(enabled: bool = True, max_phases: int | None = None, check_completion: bool = True, completion_detector: CompletionDetector | None = None, stop_on_completion: bool = True)[source]
should_follow_up(primary_result: Dict[str, Any], phases: List[Dict[str, Any]], completed_phases: int, context: Dict[str, Any]) → bool[source]

Check if follow-ups should continue.
